metadata.title: USN-6543-1 -- GNU Tar vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that tar incorrectly handled extended attributes in PAX archives. An attacker could use this issue to cause tar to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6543-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  tar-scripts - 1.28-2.1ubuntu0.2+esm3 tar - 1.28-2.1ubuntu0.2+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
